prefercite.head: Preferred Citation

custodhist.head: Provenance
custodhist.p: This collection was transferred from Rare Books on June 16, 1989.

did.unittitle: Aline Bernstein, The Gotham, New York, New York, to Phillip Moeller, Hotel St. Moritz, New York, New York [1934]

scopecontent.p: She commends his skill as director of the play "They Shall not Die" and asking if he will read her stories and accept them in friendship.
